content: This indicates everything (that we know of) that's happening during the working group meeting that is, at least in part, FHIR related. If you're aware of anything else that's happening or a change to what's posted here, either update it yourself (if you have wiki editing access) or post a note here and one of us will update it.

It's pretty hard to find a timeslot when there won't be something happening you're probably interested in. And if not, feel free to arrange ad-hoc sessions by the pool, in the bar or some other convenient location.
